title: Gumba Soil Conservation Demonstration Farm
description: Establishing a demonstration farm to promote soil conservation practices using vetiver grass.

title: Community Soil Health Awareness Campaign
description: Workshops and outreach activities to educate communities about soil health and sustainable farming practices.

title: Women and Youth Empowerment Program
description: Engaging and empowering women and youth in soil conservation activities through training and leadership development.

title: School Soil Conservation Clubs
description: Establishing soil conservation clubs in local schools to educate students about the importance of soil health.
